name: Wireless Headphones
description: Immersive sound with deep bass and crystal-clear highs. Bluetooth 5.0 for stable connection. 20 hours of playtime. Comfortable over-ear design.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back. Promotes proper posture and all-day comfort. Durable construction.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Leak-proof design. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

name: Men's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable. Cushioned sole for impact absorption. Provides excellent support and stability. Available in various sizes and colors.

name: Women's Yoga Leggings
description: High-waisted and stretchy. Moisture-wicking fabric. Provides a comfortable and flattering fit. Perfect for yoga, workouts, or everyday wear.

name: Smartwatch with Heart Rate Monitor
description: Tracks steps, calories burned, and sleep quality. Built-in heart rate monitor. Notifications for calls and messages. Water-resistant.

name: Bluetooth Speaker - Portable & Waterproof
description: Powerful sound in a compact design. Waterproof and durable. Perfect for outdoor activities. Long battery life.

name: Organic Cotton T-shirt
description: Soft and comfortable. Made from 100% organic cotton. Classic fit. Available in various colors.

name: Coffee Maker - Automatic Drip
description: Programmable timer. Brews up to 12 cups. Easy to use and clean. Perfect for coffee lovers.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Active noise cancellation blocks out unwanted sounds. Immersive audio experience. Comfortable earcups. Ideal for travel and work.
